content: Merve G端rel Zoeken Sluit zoek Merve G端rel I am an assistant professor in Computer Science at the Delft University of Technology (TU Delft). I am a member of the Pattern Recognition & Bioinformatics group within the Intelligent Systems Department and work on developing robust and reliable machine learning methods. Please see my personal website for more information.
